author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes two ancient pieces of configuration `RecoLocalTracker/SiPixelRecHits/python/PixelCPEInitial_cfi.py` and `RecoLocalTracker/SiPixelRecHits/python/PixelCPEParmError_cfi.py` supposed to support Pixel CPE `ESproducer`s that do not even exist anymore in `cmssw`. All occurrences in other subsystems are removed as well.

#### PR validation:

Passes `runTheMatrix.py -l limited --ibeos`
Zero regressions expected.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, no backport is needed.
cc: @tvami @tsusa
title: remove PixelCPEInitial_cfi and PixelCPEParmError_cfi and all their occurences
